text: María Alejandra Ana Da Passano (26 July 1947 - 30 June 2014), better known as Alejandra Da Passano, was an Argentine actress of movies, stage plays and television shows. Her best known roles were in Mr. President (1970), Malevo (1972) and La madre María (1974). She was born in Buenos Aires. Da Passano died on 30 June 2014 in Buenos Aires, aged 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in Argentina Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Argentine television actors
title: Alejandra Da Passano
